text:
[Verse]
Chillin' on the roof
City lights below
Stars begin to fade
Sky starts to glow

[Verse 2]
Night turns into day
Worries fade away
Dreams are gonna play
In the morning's sway

[Chorus]
Sunrise on the rooftop
Feel the world stop
Heart begins to hop
Never wanna drop

[Verse 3]
Birds begin to sing
New day it will bring
Love in everything
Hear the city ring

[Chorus]
Sunrise on the rooftop
Feel the world stop
Heart begins to hop
Never wanna drop

[Bridge]
Holding onto you
Sky so crystal blue
Moments feel so true
Just me and you
title: Sunrise on the Rooftop
